short_summary: Aviation Replacement Parts for Various Aircrafts
description: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENT (NPP)", "Department of National Defence, Supply Arrangement - W8485-184741 Series - Aviation Replacement Parts. Solicitation:  W8485-247657/A This requirement is to acquire 1 item for the CT-142 Dash 8 for the Department of National Defence (DND), Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) DAP 4.",
full_summary:
=====================================

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**

**Department of National Defence**

**Supply Arrangement: W8485-184741 Series - Aviation Replacement Parts**

**Solicitation Number:** W8485-247657/A

We are issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of 1 item for the CT-142 Dash 8 aircraft.

**Background:**

This procurement is part of the Department of National Defence (DND) Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) DAP4, and is an invitation-only opportunity for qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.

**Eligible Bidders:**

The following companies have been invited to submit a proposal:

* Aero Precision Industries LLC
* Aero Technical Components Inc.
* Canada West Avionics
* CASP
* JHT Defense Inc.
* PAL Aerospace
* Pratt & Whitney Canada Corp.
* Simex Defence Inc.
* Tower Aerospace Inc.
* Tulmar Safety

**RFP Documents:**

The RFP documents will be distributed via email directly by the Contracting Officer to the qualified SA Holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement.

**Submit Proposals to:**

Interested parties should submit their proposals to MCpl PJ Oakley, Aerospace Equipment Program Management, Department of National Defence, 455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau, QC J8Y 6V7. Email: PJ.Oakley@forces.gc.ca.

**Important Notice:**

An opportunity for qualification will be posted at least once a year on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS), allowing additional suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series.

**For Further Information:**

For any questions or concerns, please contact:

Jessica Lepinski, Supply Team Leader, Government of Canada, Public Services and Procurement Canada, Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector, Civilian Aircraft Division – CAG. Email: jessica.lepinski@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Terms and Conditions:**

This procurement is subject to the provisions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and will be governed by the standard terms and conditions of supply for the Department of National Defence.

**Appendix:**

Appendix [insert appendix] containing additional information, such as RFP documents and technical specifications, will be available upon request. 

**Closing Date:**

This opportunity is expected to close on
